SYSTEM: D31_-_SEEMP_Platform_specifications%28v1%29.pdf: Página 20
 
D31 –                        Version 1.1 
 
Project IST-4-027347-STP 
Page 20 of 21
• 
Implementing the necessary conversion mechanisms for transforming the standards 
into WebODE’s knowledge model XML syntax. For this purpose we have to develop 
an ad-hoc translator that will transform all the data stored in the three MS Access 
databases into three WebODE’s XML files.  
• 
Once the WebODE’s XML files are generated, the XML import service of WebODE 
will be used to upload the standard into WebODE ontology development platform. 
• 
Once the information has been uploaded into WebODE workbench, its ontology 
editor allows the ontology engineer its integration and its enrichment using WebODE 
user interface editing facilities. 
Figure 4-5 shows the stages of the process. 
Standard in MS Access format
Standard  in WebODE’s XML
format

WebODE Workbench
Standard semantically enriched
Ad-hoc translator
WebODE’s XML import service
WebODE’s ontology editor
